Description: Sandstone tomb-epitaph of Aideosa; thirteen lines of incised Greek text.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.14, pl.11)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: I.Brit.Mus.Gr. I 11:6 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
